definition: markedly new or introducing radical change, a radical supporter of political or social revolution
details:
adjective
- markedly new or introducing radical change
= example: markedly new or introducing radical change
= synonyms: radical
- advocating or engaged in revolution
= example: advocating or engaged in revolution
- relating to or having the nature of a revolution
= example: relating to or having the nature of a revolution
- of or relating to or characteristic or causing an axial or orbital turn
= synonyms: rotatory
noun
- a radical supporter of political or social revolution
= synonyms: subversive
